"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na
Emi nye yi.": wo ba kortonoo a edɔ no
column7: na kɔ Moria asaase do; na fa no kɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr wɔ hɔ
column8: wɔ mbepɔw no mu kor a mebɛkyerɛ wo no do."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na Abraham soɛɛr anapaatu hyehyɛɛ n'asoasopɔnkɔ
na ɔsee dɛ: na ɔfaa ne mberantsɛ no mu beenu kaa no ho
Abraham; na ɔsee dɛ: nye ne ba Isaak; na ɔpaa ɔhyew afɔr ne nyena no
Emi nye yi.": na ɔsoɛree kɔr mbrɛ Nyankopɔn kyerɛɛ no no."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na ne ndaansa no Abraham maa n'enyiwa do
na ɔsee dɛ: na ohun bea no wɔ ekyir noho ara."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na Abraham see ne mberantsɛ no dɛ
na ɔsee dɛ: Hom nye asoasopɔnkɔ yi ntsena ha
Abraham; na ɔsee dɛ: na emi na abofra yi yɛbɔkɔ noho

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na Abraham faa ɔhyew afɔr no ne nyena no
na ɔsee dɛ: na ɔdze soaa ne ba Isaak; na ɔfaa gya no nye sekan no kitsae; na hɔn beenu nyina bɔɔ mu kɔree."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na Isaak kasaa kyerɛɛ n'egya Abraham
column8: ogya nye enyena nye yi: na eguambaa a wɔdze rokɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr no wɔ hen?"

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na Abraham see dɛ
Abraham; na ɔsee dɛ: Nyankopɔn noara bɛkyerɛ eguambaa a wɔdze no bɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr: na hɔn beenu nyina bɔɔ mu kɔree."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na wodur mbrɛ Nyankopɔn kyerɛɛ no no; na Abraham sii afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ
Abraham; na ɔsee dɛ: na ɔkyekyeer ne ba Isaak dze no too afɔrmbukyia no do wɔ nyena no do."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na Abraham tseen ne nsa
na ɔsee dɛ: na ɔfaa sekan no dɛ ɔdze ruboku ne ba no."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe fi sor frɛɛ no
"Na ɔsee dɛ
na ɔsee dɛ: Mma mmfa wo nsa nnka abofra no
Abraham; na ɔsee dɛ: nkyii so mma nnyɛ no biribiara: na afei na mehu dɛ isuro Nyankopɔn
Emi nye yi.": susuampa dɛ ɔwo annkam me wo ba

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na Abraham maa n'enyiwa do
Emi nye yi.": oguannyin a n'ambɛn ekosuo mbirikisi mu wɔ n'ekyir: na Abraham kɔree kɛfaa oguannyin no
"#Heb 11.17-19": na ɔdze no hyɛɛ ne ba n'ananmu bɔɔ hyew afɔr."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na Abraham frɛɛ bea no ne dzin Jehovah-jireh: dɛ mbrɛ ebodu ndɛ wɔda ho ara frɛ no no
Abraham; na ɔsee dɛ: EWURADZE ne bepɔw do na wɔbɛkyerɛ."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe fi sor frɛɛ Abraham bio dɛ
"dɛ nhyira mu a
Emi nye yi.": mebɛma w'asefo adɔr dɛ ɔsor nworaba
"#Heb 11.17-19": na dɛ mpoano anhwea; na w'asefo bɛfa hɔn atamfo hɔn abotsen;"

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "na w'asefo mu na wobehyira asaase amanaman nyinara; osiandɛ etsie me ndze."
"Nna Abraham sanee baa ne mberantsɛ no nkyɛn
Abraham; na ɔsee dɛ: na wɔbɔɔ mu kɔr Beer-seba; na Abraham tsenaa Beer-seba."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom ekyir no
Emi nye yi.": Milka so awo ama wo nua Nahor;"

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "n'abakan Uz
Abraham; na ɔsee dɛ: nye Kemuel a ɔyɛ Aram n'egya;"

"Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn: "nye Kesed
"Na Betuel woo Rebeka: baawɔtwe yi na Milka woe maa Abraham no nua Nahor."
